content: Ok, yes, but want to be ready to react to his post. My priorities when this started were to get a job, any job, and maybe make chewy go viral. I shared earlier what I thought my goal should be now that gets me on my path, which is to work for an AI leader developing business automation agents or personal AI version that can be trained to manage online/career/(maybe personal), etc. to close the gap to singularity ahead of the curve. Should I be pursuing this avenue more? Or no, it doesn't change the MVP, but does change the response to Krach's post. Like do the gratitude, but then like AI thought leaders, would love to get your take. I don't want to ask him a question, because he doesn't really engage with comments.
